titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal courthouse being constructed at 129 Market Street, Youngstown, Ohio, as the "Thomas D. Lambros Federal Courthouse".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended).
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Public Works and Transportation. Report No: 100-479.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 12/18/1987--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Designates the Federal courthouse being constructed at the intersection of Front and Market Streets, Youngstown, Ohio, as the Thomas D. Lambros United States Courthouse.
